name: THE GAMBLER
description:
Digital Drawing
5511 x 5511 pxl
2020

Visuals of the artwork is about the girl that do what she want to do. As long as it make her happy. Happy is the main goals of her life. Not a Power, Positions, Money, or another materials things. Just "Happy". Sounds ridiculous.

Sometimes it she looks like do things randomly. But at the end, every single random things it just lead her to the better, better, and better way. Like randomly you push a button and...whala ! you got JACKPOT !

And it always repeated. A simple goals, A random way, but then just got A jackpot !
